alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 1:06PM AKST until December 07 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 4 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect periods of mostly light snow today. Snow will intensify during the late afternoon hours, with the heaviest snow expected this evening through early Wednesday morning. Snow will then linger through the day Wednesday, especially near the mountains.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
